EmailTemplate.description: Includes link for Takeda Coaching Clinic PFQ (Bring Manual)
EmailTemplate.name: Takeda Coaching Clinic PFQ Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: [Reminder] ENSI Program Focus Questionnaire for {!Contact.Job_Certificate_Date__c} {!Contact.Program_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
M4NTRA Coaching Clinic
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Please remember to complete your ENSI Pre-Program Questionnaire by {!Job__c.PFQ_Survey_due_date__c}. The PFQ helps the program leader to customise the program based on your needs.
Click here* to access the questionnaire.*Please note that this link is specific to you, please don't forward it to others.
NB: If you have already started your questionnaire and have opted to 'save and continue' while in the questionnaire - it is important that you use the link that was sent to you at the time you saved your response, otherwise the above link will open a new questionnaire. Remember to bring along your Green Negotiation and Influencing Manual.
Should you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me.
Kind regards
